result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Mark A. Wightman

records.addlTxt: WCS Supervision Status Report.  In order to satisfy all the program requirements, the defendant must complete primary treatment.

Defendant Mark A. Wightman in court.  Prosecuting attorney Daniel Joseph Tombasco in court for the State of Wisconsin. Clerk Dana A.  Minutes: SPD has been unable to appoint an attorney for DE for today's hearing. Court holds colloquy with DE re: proceeding pro se or waiving time to allow SPD to appoint an attorney.  DE waives time for preliminary hearing. Court reschedules preliminary hearing to an attorney status hearing.  Bond continued.
Status conference scheduled for November 9, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

PROPER ATTIRE REQUIRED.  NO SHORTS OR TANK TOPS ALLOWED IN COURTROOM. 
*Not to Possess or Consume Alcohol. *Not To Possess or Consume Controlled Substances w/o a Prescription. *Not to drive w/o VALID Driver's License. If released, Report to WCS by 11:00 the next business day; Submit to random UA's upon request.  Comply w/ all program requirements & provide all required information. No contact including the residence, electronic or 3rd party with: Jon M.

2:16 PM
Attorney Jessica Krejcarek appeared for the State. Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Benjamin Schwarz. Clerk Dana A.  Minutes: Preliminary hearing scheduled for September 28, 2022 at 09:45 am. $5000 Cash Bond Set w/conditions (see bond entry).  ec
and witness list filed by the State
